item.title: Create an Ethereum Dapp with React and Docker
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll create an Ethereum Dapp and will run its different components in a separate docker container. You can clone the project using this GitHub link. Thanks to the people who’s article and courses helped a lot: Brandon Morelli For HTML and CSS ( Build a Weather Website ) Stephen Grider For Ethereum and Docker course on Udemy. Before beginning lets understand what we’re going to build and how the structure of our Dapp will look like.
